Vegetable Pulao

Chana Masala

⏱️ 35 minutes | Chickpeas (canned or boiled), onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, coriander, turmeric

Masala Dal

⏱️ 35 minutes | Lentils (toor or masoor), onions, tomatoes, garlic, turmeric, cumin, mustard seeds, dried red chilies, g

DIY Paneer from Milk

⏱️ 30 minutes | Whole milk, lemon juice or vinegar, cheesecloth

Butter Chicken

⏱️ 45 minutes | Chicken pieces, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, chili powder, yogurt, oil
